alert.note: Alert for Arthur; Garden; Keith (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 03 at 9:37PM CDT until July 04 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of panhandle Nebraska, southwest Nebraska and west central Nebraska, including the following counties, in panhandle Nebraska, Garden. In southwest Nebraska, Keith. In west central Nebraska, Arthur. * WHEN...Until 1145 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 837 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Up to 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Ogallala, Lewellen, Lemoyne, Kingsley Dam, Otter Creek Campground, Belmar, Eagle Gulch Campground, Lake View Campground, Ruthon, Clear Creek State Wildlife Management Area, Windlass Hill, Ash Hollow State Historical Park and Bluewater Battlefield State Historical Park. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
